features: 💡【 Ajustable Brightness & 3 Colors Lighting Modes 】- The LED brightness of this hollywood lighted makeup mirror can be changed as you need. This LED makeup mirror provides 3 colors lighting modes so that you can also adjust different brightness to meet your different makeup needs, no matter it is early morning or late night.

🔍【 Detachable 10X Magnifying Mirror 】- Our light up makeup mirror has 10X magnifying mirror to help applying mascara, eyeliner, eyebrow and lipstick, creating flawless and delicate makeup, suitable for the pursuit of exquisite you.This magnification level is perfect friendly for makeup novice.

👑【Touch-Sensitive Control & Smart Memory Function】 - Simply turn on/off the light up vanity mirror and adjust the brightness by touching the sensor switch on the screen. Button M can adjust the light modes, button P can adjust the brightness. Intelligent light memory function make you easy to use the suitable light adjusted last time,which helps you get the right natural light, to create your most perfect makeup.

🎄【 Portable, Compact & Elegangt Design 】 - Overall frame allows you to get your entire face in view at once. The 9 frosted LED globe bulbs can be used continuously with 50,000 hours life span. It is very durable without changing the bulb.Fitted the rubber pads on the bottom to prevent the mirror from slipping or falling during use.

🎁【 100% Satisfaction Guarantee 】- In addition to personal use, our illuminated large makeup mirrors can also be used in commercial areas such as hair salons, weddings, or changing rooms. The illuminated makeup mirrors are fragile and difficult to control during transportation. Our products have sturdy packaging to ensure that the makeup mirrors are secure and can effectively protect items.
body.description: NUSVAN MAKEUP VANITY MIRROR What is a Hollywood Vanity Mirror? A Hollywood mirror is a lighted vanity mirror that you set in your dressing or vanity area to check your appearance, apply makeup perfectly, and do your hair. This mirror not only helps you to glam up yourself to a T but also enhances the appeal of your vanity area. The main feature of this vanity accessory is that it comes with light bulbs included in it to brighten up your face so that you can see a luminous reflection of your face in the mirror and view every detail for a flawless look. Frame: Tinplate Light: Cool white/ warm white / warm yellow Mirror Size: 25*30cm Bulb: 9*3W LED bulbs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NUSVAN MAKEUP MIRROR WITH LIGHTS NUSVAN HOLLYWOOD MIRROR MIGHT BE YOUR BEST CHOICHE. If you are not willing to spend a moolah on a piece of vanity accessory and looking for a more budget-friendly option, then this NUSVAN Hollywood vanity mirror might be your best allay. To start with, the free-standing frame of this piece of vanity fixture is constructed using durable metal to make sure it is strong. Another interesting fact about this frame is that it is rotational; with this 360-degree free rotation frame, you can adjust the mirror panel into any angle you want to have a perfect viewing angle for flawless makeup application.And also added a detachable 10X magnifying mirror with this to help you put on makeup even better.

How to Operate the Smart Touch Switch? Convert light color- Tap once to switch Daylight/Warm White/Warm Light. Turn on/off- Tap once to turn on/off the mirror. Adjust brightness- Long press to adjust the brightness stepless. Packing List hollywood mirror Instruction manual Deachtable 10X magnifying mirror 1pc 5feet US stand Adapter(12V/2A NUSVAN MAKEUP VANITY MIRROR What is a Hollywood Vanity Mirror? A Hollywood mirror is a lighted vanity mirror that you set in your dressing or vanity area to check your appearance, apply makeup perfectly, and do your hair. This mirror not only helps you to glam up yourself to a T but also enhances the appeal of your vanity area. The main feature of this vanity accessory is that it comes with light bulbs included in it to brighten up your face so that you can see a luminous reflection of your face in the mirror and view every detail for a flawless look. Frame: Tinplate Light: Cool white/ warm white / warm yellow Mirror Size: 25*30cm Bulb: 9*3W LED bulbs

Detachable 10X Magnifying Mirror The detachable 10x magnification mirror also contributes to a perfect makeup look by offering you a more detailed reflection so that applying eye makeup or drawing the eyebrows never felt easier. Smart Touch Controls The most interesting part of this mirror is its Smart Touch Controls. All its controls, the on/off switch, the dimmer as well as the color temperature controls, are incorporated in the mirror panel and can be operated effortlessly with the touch of your fingers. 360° Degree Rotation Another incredible thing about this metal frame is that it is free-standing and fully rotational. The 360-degree adjustable tilting panel provides you the flexibility to find the best reflective angle according to your viewing preferences. skid-proof mat There is a non-slip mat on the bottom so you don't have to worry about slipping or shaking. So that it stands still on the table and doesn’t fall down to destroy the glass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and bright
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a gift for my 16 yr old daughter. She loves it. It's a good size and the lights can get really bright. It doesn't take up a lot of space so it's perfect for small vanity set ups like my daughter's. I think it was worth every penny. I would definitely recommend this to other beauty and makeup lovers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love! Looks great, the light is super!Total look - beautiful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this mirror to do my makeup, love the different light settings to be able to see what my makeup will look like in different environments as well! Highly recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased for my 20-year-old daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it. I’d like to get one for myself, great lighting, great mirror, and looks great sitting on her desk in her college house!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice bright vanity
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my daughter's college dorm room. She loves it and fits nicely on her desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had multiple makeup mirrors in my life and I’m pretty sure this is the best one I’ve ever used. Like anyone who needs a mirror, no anyone who even already has one, you need this. So perfect, movable for different angles, large but not so big it’s hard to move or have to make space for, the lighting is amazing, different color hues and dimmable, all in all 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have had this for about a month. This was a Christmas gift from my husband. I love it you can dim it or brighten it to your liking. You also can change the type of lighting which is really nice. No reason to pay so much more money for other brands! I rarely leave reviews so if you’re questioning just get it you won’t regret it!! :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Muy buena Calidad el Producto, llegando en tiempo y forma.
reviews.reviewText: Es un Producto que cumple lo que se estaba buscando, sus materiales de construction son muy buenos. lo que cambiaria serian las luces ya que son algo grandes para el tamano, si fueran de un tamano menor seria un buen cambio.
Absolute trash. Product came completely shattered, also took two weeks to get here. Don’t buy this.
